echo-pref-tooltip-mention-failure: Aꞌaten le ken kꞌexaꞌak aꞌalakten men maax maꞌ patal tin kꞌexiꞌ
notification-link-text-view-mention-fail: {{PLURAL:$1|Il maax ku t'aan yóolal|Il maax t'anik}}
notification-header-mention-failure-user: {{GENDER:$2|Your}} a tuxtꞌaan "$3" maꞌ ta tuuxtabiꞌ tumene le maaxoꞌ maꞌ kaxtaꞌabiꞌ.
{{GENDER:$2|Your}} tꞌaanaꞌab tumen "$3" maꞌ tuuxtaꞌab tumen maꞌ oojletan máax tuuxtik.
notification-header-mention-failure-too-: A tuuxtꞌan maꞌtuuxtabiꞌ tumen maan u $3.
notification-header-mention-failure-bund: Tꞌaanoꞌob ichil $4 u waalil tꞌaan tuꞌux maꞌ tuuxtabiꞌ.
